resources.string: Turn on or awake a device by a network message
Analyze your network configuration to assess potential vulnerabilities. Find open ports via UPnP and NAT-PMP that may lead to external access and close them.
Sit tight! This may take a while. The Duration of the test depends on your network size and number of connected devices.
Probe a specific target host to detect open TCP ports to determine available services and assess vulnerabilities.
Display the route and measure the transit delays of packets sent from your device towards a target host across an IP network.
Measure the round trip time for messages sent from your device towards a target host across an IP network.

When you create a ScaNet account, you get access to security features, inculding
- Alters of intruders in your network
- Notify you about internet useage in your area
- Many more.
